sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The daemontools package contains svscanboot, svscan, supervise, svc, svok, svstat, fghack, pgrphack, readproctitle, multilog, tai64n, tai64nlocal, setuidgid, envuidgid, envdir, softlimit and setlock. More detailed descriptions of these commands may be found at .

sect3.title: svscanboot
sect3.para: svscanboot is simply a script that calls svscan and pipes its output to readproctitle.

sect3.title: svscan
sect3.para: svscan checks the service directory for daemons to run and starts a supervise process for each run script that it finds.

sect3.title: supervise
sect3.para: supervise runs the run script passed to it by svscan and monitors the process the script starts so that if it dies, supervise restarts it.

sect3.title: svc
sect3.para: svc sends signals to processes being run under supervise.

sect3.title: svok
sect3.para: svok checks to see that supervise is running in the directory passed to it.

sect3.title: svstat
sect3.para: svstat prints the status of processes monitored by supervise.

sect3.title: fghack
sect3.para: fghack prevents processes from putting themselves into the background.

sect3.title: pgrphack
sect3.para: pgrphack runs a process in a separate process group.

sect3.title: readproctitle
sect3.para: readproctitle displays log entries in the output of ps.

sect3.title: multilog
sect3.para: multilog is a logging program. It takes output from a daemon and appends it to any number of logs.

sect3.title: tai64n
sect3.para: tai64n is a timestamp generating program.

sect3.title: tai64nlocal
sect3.para: tai64nlocal converts output of tai64n into a human readable format.

sect3.title: setuidgid
sect3.para: setuidgid runs a specified program under a given account's uid and gid.

sect3.title: envuidgid
sect3.para: envuidgid performs the same function as setuidgid, but sets environment variables UID and GID equal to the uid and gid of the account specified.

sect3.title: envdir
sect3.para: envdir runs a given program with environment variables specified by files in a directory.

sect3.title: softlimit
sect3.para: softlimit allows resource limits to be set for a given program.

sect3.title: setlock
sect3.para: setlock locks a file and runs a program.
